author: coheigea
msg: Add the ability to return roles from a TokenValidator. Return roles by default from the SAMLTokenValidator. Set the roles on the TokenDelegationHandler.

author: markt
msg: Put a limit on the number of Locale to StringManager mappings that will be cached.

author: markt
msg: When less than 127, no need to convert to unsigned.

author: markt
msg: Profiling indicates that UTF-8 encoding is the bottleneck. Harmony's encoder is slightly faster than Java 7's so use Harmony's.
